title: Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback

comment:
REVIEW: CR-081-VAR-001 v0.1 -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Switch PTY Manager to tmux Control Mode for Terminal Scrollback" -- present and non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for v0.1 of a self-authorizing executable document per SOP-001 Section 5.1.

SOP-004 SECTION 9A.3 REQUIRED CONTENT -- all sections present and complete:
1. Variance Identification: Parent=CR-081 (verified IN_EXECUTION at v1.1), Affected Item=EI-4/Scope expansion, Type=Type 1.
2. Detailed Description: Clearly states expected vs. actual. Documents four failed workaround approaches (DECSTBM stripping, extended scroll regions, SU-to-newline conversion, resize suppression) with technical rationale for each failure.
3. Root Cause: "Scope Error" -- tmux normal attach performs lossy viewport rendering that destroys scrollback semantics. Control mode bypasses rendering entirely.
4. Variance Type: "Scope Error" correctly selected from SOP-004 enumerated list with sound justification.
5. Impact Assessment with Scope Handoff per 9A.5: (a) Accomplished in parent: EI-1 through EI-3 passing with specific evidence cited. (b) VAR absorbs: EI-4 failure plus scope expansion for control mode implementation (pty_manager rewrite, useHubConnection simplification, new unit tests). (c) Explicit confirmation: "No scope items are lost."
6. Proposed Resolution: Technically detailed -- explains control mode protocol, lists per-file changes at function level, identifies additions, modifications, and removals.
7. Resolution EIs: Four EIs covering backend rewrite, frontend simplification, unit tests, and manual verification -- logical progression with complete coverage.

TYPE 1 CLASSIFICATION: Correct per SOP-004 9A.2. Parent CR-081 EI-4 (manual verification) cannot pass without scrollback working. Full VAR closure is required before parent can close.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in pre-approved content. Executable block editable fields ([EXECUTION_SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER], [DATE]) are correctly blank per SOP-004 Section 4.1.

FORMATTING/ERRORS: No typos found. Section numbering sequential (1-9). Markdown tables well-formed. Code blocks properly fenced. Consistent formatting throughout.

REFERENCES: SOP-004, CR-081, CR-080, SOP-002 -- all relevant and valid.
